description.message: Print the current page you see with one single click. That for all kinds of photo printing, poster printing, business cards, etc.

textfoot.message: This software is licensed under the CC-GNU GPL. To view a copy of this license, visit

donatepromotext.message: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

ratedes.message: And let everyone know about this great extension!

desfinancetoolbar.message: Your personal stocks toolbar on your desktop is also available for your computer.

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.

showremember.message: Do not show this reminder page again when I open the options page

skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the options page

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Print Browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Print extension in your web browser.

promotext.message: Want to use something new and amazing for your web browser? Try the $product$ Browser extension.

donatetext.message: Due to the very small number of donations the project may be closed. Please support further development with a Donation.

sharetexta.message: Get this Cool Print Browser Extension

sharetextb.message: Hey, this is amazing! I tried the Print browser extension just today.

sharetextc.message: The Best and Amazing Print Browser extension

sharetextd.message: Print browser extension is the Best Tool for my web browser. Download it now and try it yourself!

descontextmenu.message: Enable the right click menu to print the current web page

titeldoesntwork.message: Print doesn't work on this web page. Please try another page.

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

desremrate.message: If you like Print™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

desyoutube.message: Discover and learn more about Stefan's browser extension. Watch it now on YouTube.

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love Print! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

permissionactivetab.message: This will only print the currently open tab page.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This is to add the "Print" menu item in the web browser context menu.

permissionstorage.message: This is to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.
